scripts.build: yarn build:types && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir dist/cjs --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --ignore "**/*.stories.tsx,**/*.test.ts" --source-maps inline
scripts.build:esm: BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir dist/esm --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --ignore "**/*.stories.tsx,**/*.test.ts" --source-maps inline
scripts.dev: BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir dist/cjs --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --ignore "**/*.stories.tsx,**/*.test.ts" --source-maps inline --watch
